name: toggl-track
title: Toggl Track
description: Start and stop time entries with Toggl Track
author: franzwilhelm

commands.name: index
commands.title: Start/Stop Time Entry
commands.description: Start a new time entry or end the running time entry.

commands.title: View Workspaces
commands.description: A list of all the workspace you have access to.

commands.name: manageTags
commands.title: Manage Tags
commands.description: A list of all the tags you have access to.

commands.name: manageClients
commands.title: Manage Clients
commands.description: A list of all the clients you have access to.

commands.name: manageProjects
commands.title: Manage Projects
commands.description: A list of all the projects you have access to.

preferences.description: The API token for your Toggl account.
preferences.name: togglApiToken
preferences.title: Toggl API Token
